properties.Name: LegalEntityAccountingPeriodAccountingBasis
properties.Description: The accounting basis used by the Legal Entity for the associated accounting period.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description:
The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

In this case it is the business, organization or legal entity whose books are being recorded and financial statements presented.

Columns.Name: AccountingPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: AccountingPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The ending date of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ChangeInAccountingPrincipleIndicator
Columns.Description: Use of an accounting principle in the current year different from the one used in the preceding year.

Columns.Name: AccountingBasisId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Basis.
